attributes.action: Make holiday prices fairer in the school holidays.
attributes.additional_details: Ive seen a number of parents being faced with fines because they just want to go on holiday as a family! But they are given no other choice than to go in term time because of the rediculous prices that holiday companies are asking for. Not only are families facing this, but teachers are too! Teachers word very hard throughout the year and should not have to pay almost double for a break away!
attributes.background: Families all around the UK are faced with paying rediculous prices for holidays during school holiday time and faced with consequences when they take their children out of term time to go away. The prices almost double during holiday time and it needs to stop!
